creator: mravichandran@Hotmail.com
text:
using the the isapi_redirector2.dll from the following URL: 
http://mirrors.mix5.com/apache/jakarta/tomcat-connectors/jk2/binaries/win32/

I had put them a folder called CATALINA_HOME/BIN/WIN32.

created a virtual directory by name 'Jakarta' and pointed to
the win32 folder.

added an entry in the ISAPI folder and pointed the redirector2.dll

modified the worker.properties and copied the uriworkers.properties
to /CATALINA_HOME/CONF folder.

still I am getting the 'red' arrow. 

using XP workstation 

thanks for your help.

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
I recommend using mod_jk for now, rather than mod_jk 2, since its binaries are
quite old. Please use tomcat-user to debug this.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been confirmed by popular vote. ***
